page.title: 19Sundays (cont) Clothes
page.content:
If Mum is working Dad cooks Sunday lunch, roast meat, vegetables from the gardens and a sweet. If we go to the beach, or to a Motor-bike Trial or to a Cricket Match we take snacks with us and cook the meal when we get home. Often we have friends round in the afternoon or evening. Tea is salads or sandwiches and cake. In winter we play Monopoly or Subbuteo. We enjoy T.V. on Gardening or Wild Life or a good Film. Then its time for bath and bed.
{Caroline Young writes:}I have quite a lot of clothes. In summer for play I wear T-shirts and shorts and sandals. If I go out for a special occasion I wear a pretty dress. My brother has a smart shirt, nice trousers and a waist coat. In winter we need warmer clothes a jacket, thicker trousers, boots with warm socks and a hat and scarf. (cont)
